thing-type.label: 14288 In-Wall Outlet
thing-type.description: In-Wall Outlet<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtTransform any home into a smart home with the GE Z-Wave Plus In-Wall Tamper-Resistant Smart Outlet. The GE Z-Wave Plus In-Wall Tamper-Resistant Smart Outlet enables wireless control of on/off functions from the Z-Wave controlled outlet, and is compatible with incandescent, LED, Halogen, fluorescent and compact fluorescent bulbs. The Smart Outlet replaces your current electrical outlet, uses your existing wiring, and provides a Z-Wave enabled outlet for the lamp or appliance that you would like to control and a standard pass-through AC outlet for other electrical appliances. The receptacle requires in-wall installation with hardwired connections. Take control of your smart home lighting with the GE Z-Wave Plus Wireless Smart Outlet Control.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtOnce the controller is ready to add your device, press and release the Program Button to add it in the network.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtOnce the controller is ready to remove your device, press and release the manual/program button to remove it from the network.</p&gt
